channel.title: Different Yells
channel.description: Well on my server, it yells out something every 600 seconds or mili seconds, not really sure anyways, I wanted to make it say different yells at a different time, like it says "Donate" at 310 seconds or something. How am I able to do that?

item.title: Different Yells
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

gangsta tony:

I know how to make a yell message but I want to have a 5 different ones at a different timer

Make a new int

Set it equal to 0

Have a message if the timer is up AND if the int is equal to 0
have that yell the message and change the int to 1
Have another message if the timer is up AND if it the in is equal to 1
have that yell the message and change the int to 2

etc etc
untill the last one sets it back to 0.

Read full topic

item.title: Different Yells
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

I know how to make a yell message but I want to have a 5 different ones at a different timer

item.title: Different Yells
item.dc:creator: @wanttobecoders wanttobecoders
item.description:
@wanttobecoders wrote:

In client.java search

[size=10pt]public void process()[/size]

Under add

if (tellTimer > 0) { tellTimer -= 1; } else if (tellTimer <= 0) { sendMessage("You're message here !"); tellTimer = 180; }

Change the Message to what you want and the timer is set to 180 = 3min change it to what you want
Hope I help you

Read full topic

The base is Czar

item.title: Different Yells
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“WoodcutGuy, post:3, topic:371863”]Depends on your base, but it most likely is in Client.java, search for whatever it is saying right now, and change it that way? Like right now mine is:

public boolean process() { if (annoTimer > 0) { annoTimer--; } else { sM("[BOT] REMEMBER TO VOTE EVERY 12 HOURS & BE REWARDED!"); annoTimer = 460; }[/quote]
That would be for Delta and you would also need to declare the annoTimer variable.

Read full topic

item.title: Different Yells
item.dc:creator: @WoodcutGuy WoodcutGuy
item.description:
@WoodcutGuy wrote:

Depends on your base, but it most likely is in Client.java, search for whatever it is saying right now, and change it that way? Like right now mine is:

public boolean process() { if (annoTimer > 0) { annoTimer--; } else { sM("[BOT] REMEMBER TO VOTE EVERY 12 HOURS & BE REWARDED!"); annoTimer = 460; }

Read full topic
